column4: hmm, forgive me the spamming then but ill ask my question every like 10-20 minutes, maybe it will reach someone able to help.

my problem: both konqueror and kcontrol hangs up my system in very ugly way, they freeze display and keyboard. it seems that they run at very high priority cause at very beggining of app start i can hit CAPS_LOCK for example and it lights after ten or more seconds. but rest of system is unusable after that. help?
i c. omw to kubuntu then ;)
i am currently just doing apt-get ... kde
